Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 40 minutes ago, njmksr said:
> 
> 
> Do you want to ally? The Barbecue Hill Coalition!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I join in and bring an awesome soundsystem
> 

Sounds good to me.

Barbecue party hill.

[@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) sends in BOPE. [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) sends in an army of cute little puppies and kerbal rocket launchers. I send in the SEALs. The SEALs, kerbal rocket launchers and BOPE create a distraction. [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) sends in the puppies, which kills the opponent with their cuteness. After all that, [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) sends in funkeiros in to celebrate our hill.

Our barbecue hill!

-

-

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-05T01:34:52Z" title="10/05/2016 01:34  AM" data-short="7 yr">October 5, 2016</time> by Wildcat111**

Me and my well-fed bureaucrats storm the hill on foot and we take it over after an epic battle.

My hill.

no one is going up the hill

![Cap_nascimento.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/pt/6/6a/Cap_nascimento.jpg)

[![flamethrower.jpg](https://s1.postimg.io/7ge8xeulr/flamethrower.jpg)](https://s1.postimg.io/7ge8xeulr/flamethrower.jpg "Enlarge image")  

![hqdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/8CIhhfhMCjI/hqdefault.jpg)

![hqdefault.jpg](https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Xh5oSof2AUc/hqdefault.jpg)  
  
![0,,36867123-EX,00.jpg](http://g1.globo.com/Noticias/Rio/foto/0,,36867123-EX,00.jpg)  

it shall be [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/), [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and mine!!

P.S: [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) I used all the pictures you posted when you and I were fighting for the hill. Sorry for the inconvenience.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-08T15:14:08Z" title="10/08/2016 03:14  PM" data-short="7 yr">October 8, 2016</time> by Wildcat111**

Call in a non nuclear icbm onto the hill payload around 3 kilotons the hill is slightly dented in the center 

i set up base there guarded by 256^8 nuclear proximity mines witha payload of 1 megaton that will explode if anything moves within a 1.32435 kilometres radius

your move

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-07T03:05:45Z" title="10/07/2016 03:05  AM" data-short="7 yr">October 7, 2016</time> by Ethanadams**

I send a goat over there, everything explodes while I'm safely away, you included  

our remains of a hill again

**Edited <time datetime="2016-10-07T04:21:44Z" title="10/07/2016 04:21  AM" data-short="7 yr">October 7, 2016</time> by JoseEduardo**
I send in broforce we capture the hill and defend it

Jeb sends a rocket and drops it right on top of the ~~hill~~ crater now and I climb onto another hill and claim it as:

My hill.

I walk by him and push him off the hill.

My hill.

I un-push him off the hill.

His hill.

Me, [@Wildcat111](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165926-wildcat111/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) collectively push him off his hill, so he rolls all the way to the bottom. We then proceed to cover him in dirt.

Our hill

Also, adding to [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/)'s statement, you are unarmed and you are soon crushed by the dirt.

OUR HILL.

![latest?cb=20120203204747](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/cnc/images/0/09/RA2_Desolator_Icons.png/revision/latest?cb=20120203204747)

İ see you are in flesh and no buildings

There goes the neighborhood !!!

My hill

> 
> 
> 3 hours ago, 64Bit said:
> 
> 
> ![latest?cb=20120203204747](http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/cnc/images/0/09/RA2_Desolator_Icons.png/revision/latest?cb=20120203204747)
> 
> 
> 
> İ see you are in flesh and no buildings
> 
> 
> 
> 
> There goes the neighborhood !!!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> My hill
> 

I promptly destroy the planet covered in hills, and go populate a new one with my hill, that has a force field around it. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P").

my hill.
The fact is when you see my hill, you don't think about it as a hill ... You say : "What a mountain!"

Me, [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) push you off the mountain and you become unconscious. Then we cover you with dirt and we call in hu3 which compacts the dirt , suffocating and crushing you in the process.

Our mountain.

11:00 I call McCree

11:59 McCree comes along

12:00 *Its high noon!*

You three get shot and fall of the mountain.

My ~~hill~~ mountain.

I summon the Overwatch memes. They get revenge for what you did to them (burying them) and push you off the mountain. Me, [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) and [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) then bury you with dirt and then we make the slopes too steep to climb. Then we build anti aircraft fortifications on the mountain.

now nobody is going up the hill. 

Our hill.

I invoke the memes of the other side of the rivalry. Wait, did I say memes? I meant BEAMS. THE FORTIFICATIONS ARE IN THE BEAM. They are removed by the beam.

I then send engies to build a nest on the hill, and use a teleporter to get up there. Only those that bear POOTIS can enter the nest, which is at the top of the hill, now.

![dnews-files-2013-07-russia-proton-explos](http://static.ddmcdn.com/gif/blogs/dnews-files-2013-07-russia-proton-explosion-670x440-130702-jpg.jpg)

RIP Pootis (pootis->putin->russia)

I send the SpaceX Rocket UFOs in Australia to attack you.

I climb the Mount Everest and claim it as my hill! Nobody will want to climb the Mount Everest simply for being king of the hill.

Everyone can keep their hills.

> 
> 
> Just now, ZentroCatson said:
> 
> 
> Nobody will want to **CLIMB** the Mount Everest simply for being king of the hill.
> 

That's right. Nobody would want to climb Mount Everest to claim it as their hill. Instead, me, [@Wildcat111](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165926-wildcat111/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) get airlifted to the top. We then kick you off Everest and claim it as our ~~hill~~ mountain. We now have Everest as well as our other mountain.

Our ~~hills~~ mountains!

Also, me [@TheEpicSquared](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/158667-theepicsquared/) and [@JoseEduardo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/127759-joseeduardo/) claim the hill in Australia by taking it by sheer force using the US Army, Kerbal Rocket Launchers, BOPE and cute little puppies.

Our empire!

[@Wildcat111](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165926-wildcat111/) Don't forget the Swedish Special Forces!

![Swedish_SOG_Training.jpg](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/e/e8/Swedish_SOG_Training.jpg)

Oh, and we also claim Olympus Mons on Mars.

Our multi-planetary empire! Nobody can stop us now! MUAHAHAHAHA

> 
> 
> 57 minutes ago, TheEpicSquared said:
> 
> 
> [@Wildcat111](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/165926-wildcat111/) Don't forget the Swedish Special Forces!
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Oh, and we also claim Olympus Mons on Mars.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Our multi-planetary empire! Nobody can stop us now! MUAHAHAHAHA
> 

You live in Sweden? I live in Canada.

Also NASA decides to work with us to help us conquer space!

Our empire! Nobody can stop us now! MWAHAHAHAHAHA!!!!!
